context.description: Files related to mineral resources evaluation databases, including drilling data, assays, lithology, and hole geometry

Collar.description: Collar/header file containing basic information for each drilling hole

characteristics.structure: One row per hole (file is generally unique per hole)

hole_id.characteristics: Unique hole identifier, usually with great variety of nomenclatures (e.g., DH0001, BH-001, DDH-1234)

coordinates.characteristics: Spatial coordinates (UTM, local, etc.), values usually large (thousands for X/Y)

validation_rules.coordinates_present: Must have at least 3 coordinate columns (X, Y, Z or equivalents)
validation_rules.one_row_per_hole: Generally one row per hole (may have duplicates, but structure is unique)
validation_rules.hole_id_unique: BHID should have many unique values (each hole has an ID)

Survey.description: Survey file containing hole geometry data (dip, azimuth) along depth

characteristics.structure: Multiple rows per hole (measurements along depth)

hole_id.characteristics: Hole identifier, appears multiple times (once per measurement)

dip.characteristics: Hole inclination angle relative to vertical

azimuth.validation: Values between 0 and 360 degrees (hole direction in horizontal plane)

depth.validation: Depth where measurement was taken, values should increase along the hole

validation_rules.dip_range: DIP must be between -90 and 90 degrees
validation_rules.azimuth_range: AZIMUTH/BRG must be between 0 and 360 degrees
validation_rules.multiple_rows_per_hole: Generally multiple rows per hole (measurements at different depths)
validation_rules.depth_progression: If depth column exists, should increase along the hole

Assay.description: Assay file containing chemical element concentrations in depth intervals

characteristics.structure: Multiple rows per hole (depth intervals with grades)

depth_intervals.validation: TO must be greater than FROM for each interval

element_columns.description: Columns with chemical element names or their compounds
element_columns.characteristics: Values usually in ppm, %, g/t, or similar units

validation_rules.element_values: Element values must be non-negative and within reasonable ranges
validation_rules.multiple_rows_per_hole: Generally multiple rows per hole (different intervals)

Lithology.description: Lithology file containing rock type classification in depth intervals

characteristics.structure: Multiple rows per hole (depth intervals with lithological classification)

lithology_code.characteristics: Short codes (usually 2-4 letters) representing rock types

validation_rules.lithology_categorical: Lithology column must be categorical with limited values

Density.description: Density file containing density values in depth intervals

characteristics.structure: Multiple rows per hole (intervals with density measurements)

density.validation: Typical values between 1.5 and 5.0 g/cm³ for rocks
